title: Archon Beta Launch Party (MASSIVE V2 Overhaul!)
description:
Come be a part of the launch of the next big MCP server for AI coding assistants! I'll showcase the power of Archon, show you how to try it yourself immediately, and speak to the insane vision that we have for it!

Behind the scenes, me and a couple other guys from the Dynamous community have been up to BIG things, overhauling Archon to make it the knowledge and task management backbone for AI coding assistants. This is something that is so clearly missing from every AI coding assistant right now and we're bringing it straight to you as an open source project that we're dedicated to build into the best MCP server for AI coding. Come be a part of the Archon launch and try it out for yourself!

NOTE: The logo has changed for Archon to keep our branding unique! The logo was too similar to some other things before, and it's nice to bring the shield back from the previous Archon.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- If you're looking to join a community for early AI adopters all mastering AI coding and sharing goldmines of resources with each other, check out Dynamous:
https://dynamous.ai

- Archon GitHub Repo:
https://github.com/coleam00/Archon

- BMAD Method:
https://github.com/bmad-code-org/BMAD-METHOD
